attributes.action: look into the expensive and unneccesary acs gas re-examination every five years for already expierienced personell, enough is enough!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After doing my acs gas for the third time this year and once again losing £1,000+ in income whilst going through the motions at college, not to mention the cost of this pointless excersise totalling £750, Enough is enough! it is time us gas engineers stood up to the money making excersises that our profession has fallen victim too, I am sick and tired of having to pay for this course pay for that course when all it would take would be for the gas safe inspector to get off his backside and visit us annually to ask us some test questions to check we are up to speed and a publication sent directly too us to update us of any new regulations!, I like most engineers carry out the same duties week in week out and benefit absolutely nothing by this rediculous system, its time to stand up. The argument from the money making individuals is laughable, lets finally put this to a vote and see the unanimous decision it will bring.
